name: Null and Void DEMO
description:
Null and Void is an eerie adventure where you traverse inside a machine that is digesting you alive.

Features

  • 4 Characters
  • 12 Different Skills + Combos
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • 1 weird adventure to get your head wrapped around

Version 0.1.1

This is a demo build so if you are interested in seeing a full game made from this, feel free to let me know.

Any other feedback, comments, or bug reports can be sent to nullandvoid.game@gmail.com

Developed by @TheCalooch
